item.description: President Donald Trump vowed this week to rid Washington, D.C., of homeless encampments, though what those plans will look like are unclear.

item.title: WATCH: Welcome to Emmy the Labrador's neighborhood
item.description: A Labrador in Southern California has gone viral on TikTok after her owner trained her to ring a special doorbell so she can visit their neighbors.

item.title: Wisconsin woman found guilty 6 years after failed assassination in U.K.
item.description: Aimee Betro covered her face in a niqab as she climbed out of a car in 2019 and tried to shoot a man at point-blank range, prosecutors said.

item.title: Video shows steel workers scrambling into wreckage left by explosion that killed 2 in Pennsylvania
item.description: After an explosion rocked a steel plant outside Pittsburgh, workers scrambled into the wreckage alongside firefighters directing streams of water.
